content: pattern coming end of november 2025 **about** the reliable raglan is worked seamlessly from the top down and in the&nbsp round you ll begin at the collar before working the yoke which includes&nbsp optional german short row to shape the neckline and raglan increases&nbsp to form the shoulders once the yoke is complete the stitches are&nbsp divided at the armholes and the body is joined to work in the round the&nbsp sleeves are then picked up and worked down to the cuffs allowing you&nbsp to easily adjust the length as desired **skill level** beginner level **techniques** this pattern works the following techniques knit purl working in the round 1x1 rib tubular bind off short row stranded colourwork **gauge** 21 sts and 28 row = 4 inches / 10 cm in stockinette stitch on 4 mm us 6 needles blocked 24 sts and 34 row = 4 inches / 10 cm in&nbsp 1x1 rib on 3 5 mm us 4 needles blocked if you have more stitches on 4 inches / 10 cm than stated use a larger needle size if you
